lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Angels medical staff may suggest Albert Pujols won't be ready for the start of the regular season, but the slugger thinks otherwise.

headline.print_headline: Angels' Pujols Eyes Opening Day, More Open to DH
headline.main: Angels' Pujols Eyes Opening Day, More Open to DH

snippet: The Los Angeles Angels medical staff may suggest Albert Pujols won't be ready for the start of the regular season, but the slugger thinks otherwise....
